secondaryColorStep - Variable in class SierpinskiTriangle
The change in the secondary color required at each level of recursion to generate a gradient-like effect in the image.

setColorSteps() - Method in class SierpinskiTriangle
Computes the change in color required to move evenly from black (0, 0, 0) to the given colors in SierpinskiTriangle.drawingDepth steps.
